trans-unit.source: This process is taking longer than expected. Please wait.
trans-unit.target: このプロセスに予想以上時間がかかっています。お待ちください。
trans-unit.note: Progress indicator message when the SDK is waiting for the server to complete a request due to an API lock (API error -3) - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: 要求が多すぎます。お待ちください。
trans-unit.note: Progress indicator message when the SDK is waiting for the server to complete a request due to a rate limit (API error -4) - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Unable to reach MEGA. Please check your connectivity or try again later.
trans-unit.target: MEGAに到達できません。接続を確認するか、後でもう一度お試しください。
trans-unit.note: Progress indicator message when the SDK is waiting for the server to complete a request due to connectivity issue - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Servers are too busy. Please wait…
trans-unit.target: サーバーがビジーです。少々お待ちください。
trans-unit.note: Progress indicator message when servers are too busy. SDK is waiting for the server to complete a request due to a HTTP error 500 - (String as short as possible).
